text: ::Not to be confused with Nippombashi Station in Osaka, Japan. Nihombashi Station (, ) is a railway station of Tokyo Metro and Toei Subway in Chiyoda, Tokyo, Japan. ==Adjacent stations== ; Tokyo Metro : Ginza Line ::: Kyōbashi （G 10） - Nihombashi （G 11） - Mitsukoshimae （G 12） : Tōzai Line :: Rapid, Local ::: Ōtemachi （T 09） - Nihombashi （T 10） - Kayabachō （T 11） ; Toei Subway : Toei Asakusa Line :: Airport Rapid, Airport Access Express, Airport Rapid Limited Express ::: Shimbashi （A 10） - Nihombashi （A 13） - Higashi-Nihombashi （A 15） :: Local, Express, Rapid, Commuter Limited Express, Limited Express, Access Express, Rapid Limited Express ::: Takarachō （A 12） - Nihombashi （A 13） - Ningyōchō （A 14） Category:1932 establishments in Japan Category:Railway stations in Tokyo
title: Nihombashi Station
